body.name: ThermoFlask 40 oz Double Wall Vacuum Insulated Stainless Steel 2-Pack of Water Bottles, Midnight/Stone
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 4 hrs 21 mins
features: 2-Pack Stainless Steel Water Bottles: These double-wall vacuum insulated stainless steel bottles prevent outside temperatures from affecting the inside beverage temperature so your drink stays just the way you like it; all day long
Leak-Proof Chug Lid: Enjoy hassle-free hydration with our water bottle's innovative Chug lid, designed for easy one-handed sipping without spills. Perfect for on-the-go refreshment.
Adventure-Ready Hydration: ThermoFlask's insulated bottles are your daily companion, keeping hot drinks warm and cold beverages chilled. Ideal for the active lifestyle.
Versatile Hydration Options: Choose from our premium 14-64 oz insulated bottles in various colors. Fits most cup holders and backpacks, ensuring hydration is always at hand.
Sustainable Quality with ThermoFlask: Embrace eco-friendly hydration for outdoor activities or daily commuting. Our durable stainless steel bottles are built to last.
body.description: Experience All-Day Temperature Control with ThermoFlask: Our double-wall vacuum insulated stainless steel water bottles keep your drinks cold without a cooler or hot without a microwave, ensuring your beverage stays perfect – all day. Ideal for daily adventures and outdoor activities such as hiking, camping, biking, sports, and picnics. Enjoy the convenience of easy, controlled, one-handed drinking. ThermoFlask delivers hydration your way.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the large grip loops on lids!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great value, even better if you catch it on sale. Thermoflask has about the best straw lid out there, the reason is that it has the wide loop for carrying the bottle comfortably. These fit the various sizes of Thermoflask and Takeya except maybe not the half gallon size. The Takeya Actives straw lid, in comparison, has a tiny loop and one can fit one or two fingers through it. This set came with two straw lids and two spout lids. Decided to switch the color and trim the straw and use it on my other 24 oz Takeya flask.My husband wanted a black lid for replacement for his, he’s notorious for dropping his flask while working outdoors. I wasn’t willing to fork over more than $12 for a black Takeya straw lid! This was slightly more and got two flasks, two straw lids, two spout lids! Awesome deal, hope they never increase the cost as it was just affordable. Now the spout lid will stay on these for water when traveling. It’s also good to fill them up for water when power is going to be out possibly. the colors were not my favorite pick but they were out of the ones I wanted and some were more expensive. I think they were lower to reduce the stock of the less popular colors.Thermoflask are great quality and keep beverages cold 24 hours, or longer! Ice doesn’t fully melt. It also keeps hot drinks hot if one wanted to take a flask of coffee to work on a cold day! I think 12 hours for hot beverages. We have tested them out good before with this brand.IMPORTANT it says you can put in dish washer but don’t do it. It messes up the flask’s insulation. Also, it makes the color coating deteriorate quicker. Just get a bottle brush and some warm soapy water, it’s worth it to maintain the life of these and keep them looking great and lasting great!Now, if they’d just offer the 24 oz ones in sets like these! One year I got some for family for a gift for my nephews and nieces and they all loved them. It was right around 2020 and the straw lids came in handy in public, don’t have to touch the straw or tilt head back, just flip straw up, very sanitary. We haven’t had much issue with them leaking, just see the gaskets are in it. One time one 24 oz one was leaking and the lid didn’t look damaged. So I replaced the straw. That did the trick! So always try that first, they come with more than one straw. Oh get a straw brush too so it’s all sanitary; it’s not included but they aren’t expensive.10/26/23 UPDATE: One straw lid failed; when it is folded down it doesn’t sit flat. Cup has not been dropped nor bumped. Seller paper says limited lifetime warranty so I will likely reach out to them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: This water bottle is great! I have had it for several months and it does not disappoint. Keeps cold drinks cold for a long time, holds lots of liquid, easy to clean, lots of room for me to personalize with stickers, a handle on the lid that easily fits in my hand when I cary it. I like to attach a carabiner clip to the handle to attach to other things if I need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The stainless steel water bottle is a fantastic investment for anyone looking to reduce their environmental footprint. Its durable construction ensures it can withstand the rigors of daily use, while the insulated design keeps beverages hot or cold for extended periods. Its sleek and modern appearance also adds a touch of style to hydration, making it a practical and eco-friendly choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great price for this double pack of water bottles and size. The bottles come with a different lid in case you don't want straw lid which is a good option to have. They keep water cold for so long, only water bottle you need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Throw all of you OTHER water bottles away!!
reviews.reviewText: These water bottles surpass any other water bottles out there!I would love to have them in every color! Perfect for any situation! I have used these at soccer games and normal day errands! Keeps water cold and ice solid for days!! Fits perfectly in my cup holders. Easy to clean!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Keeps water cold
reviews.reviewText: Don’t get me wrong I loved the flask, it keeps your water nice and cold and the ice lasts long too! But I ordered the cobalt and black one, (one for me and my gf) and I received the teal and black one. The color was pretty but I was genuinely disappointed because I wanted the blue one but other than that I recommend it to people that don’t want to spend a lot of money on a Stanley or hydro flask. Literally it’s the same thing as those brands just that it’s cheaper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: What more do you need than this! They are cute colors and work great. No tin taste and it doesn't leak! I love my water so this is perfect!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are great. Very good insulation keeps my daughters water cold all day. We live in the Tropics so this is a must. Looks great. Strong handle. Vibrant colours. Easy to clean. I only wish the had it in a larger capacity.
Excelente producto, preserva frío o caliente con empaquetes que hacen que no se derrame los líquidos. Lo recomiendo ampliamente.
El tamaño justo para el lunch de mis niñas de 8 años, no se tira el agua y mantiene fresca la bebida

Parecem ser muito boas, vou testar, são robustas e aparentam ser muito resistentes, possuem uma base de silicone removível e as crianças (4 e 9 anos) conseguiram abrir o bico com muita facilidade. Acho que crianças menores teriam dificuldade pois ñ tem acionamento por botão. BPA free, como eu queria, 24h de bebida gelada é o que promete! A embalagem da Amazon protegeu bem, chegaram sem amassados. Esse conjunto estava numa oferta e as cores agradaram bastante por aqui, são lindas, um pouco pesadas por ter a parede grossa.
Mantienen el frío y calor por mucho tiempo!Me gusta la gran capacidad y colores que tienen. Estos en específico vienen con dos tapas, lo que lo hace mejor aún.Súper recomendables.

reviews.reviewerName: Justo lo que necesitaba, se ven elegantes y vienen bien empacadas.
reviews.reviewText: Este tipo de productos solo está disponible en tiendas en temporada y tenerlos a la mano por aquí es lo máximo. Son ligeros y funcionan perfecto tanto para bebidas frías como calientes. Es mi marca favorita, además el lavado dela boquilla es fácil porque no tiene popotes donde se almacenen hongos y para mi eso es importantísimo.
